mixed-citation.article-title: Four new species and new records of Platygastrinae (Hymenoptera: Platygastridae) from Iran

tp:treatment-sec.p: Norway ( Buhl 1997 ); England and Scandinavia ( Buhl 1998 ); Fennoscandia and Denmark ( Buhl 1999 ); Canary Islands and Madeira ( Buhl & Koponen 2003b ); Finland ( Buhl 2005 ); Ireland ( Buhl & O’Connor 2010 ); England ( Buhl & Notton 2009 ); Germany (Buhl et al. 2016); Iran ( new record ).
